## BootstrapSelectDirective class

Directive that wraps bootstrap select

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BootstrapSelectDirective implements AfterViewChecked, AfterContentInit, OnDestroy 
```

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(\_element, \_iterableDiffers, platformId, \_renderer)](./bootstrap-select.bootstrapselectdirective._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>BootstrapSelectDirective</code> class |

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [contentOptions](./bootstrap-select.bootstrapselectdirective.contentoptions.md) |  | <code>QueryList&lt;BootstrapSelectOptionDirective&gt;</code> | Array of options that are in this select |
|  [disabled](./bootstrap-select.bootstrapselectdirective.disabled.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Indication that current bootstrap select is disabled |
|  [selectChanged](./bootstrap-select.bootstrapselectdirective.selectchanged.md) |  | <code>Observable&lt;any&gt;</code> | Gets observable that is trigerred when select value changed |
|  [value](./bootstrap-select.bootstrapselectdirective.value.md) |  | <code>any</code> | Gets or sets value of select picker, any picker supported value |
